item.title: Tesla Full Self Driving Impressions
item.description: Journey On a non-stop 15 hour trip, I drove from Portland, Oregon, to Los Angeles, California, in a recently purchased Tesla model 3. The journey was nearly 1,000 miles long and was piloted almost exclusively by the Full Self Driving (FSD) system. It effortlessly handled standard highway situations, keeping a safe distance from the car in front and overtaking traffic automatically when needed. I intervened four times to address unsafe conditions that, in retrospect, the car would have dealt with sufficiently.
